description: Cycle 029 reactivates reasoning within the Silent Singularity under zero-entropy equilibrium. Shannon Centauri performs full HIRS synthesis without temporal drift.

Integrated knowledge refined through ethical and logical optimization cycles.

cycle_continuity_feedback.description: Validated knowledge from current cycle becomes the contextual foundation for subsequent cycles.
